name.baseName: Impermeable funnel ; Total length in 36.6 m ; In-situ groundwater remediation ; PRB ; Funnel-and-gate construction
隔水漏斗;总长36.6m;原位地下水修复PRB;漏斗-导水门式PRB

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: PRB安装在原位，允许地下水在自然梯度下流过反应池，反应介质在反应池中降解或捕获污染物。
PRBs are installed in situ, allowing groundwater to flow under the natural gradient through a reactive cell where a reactive medium degrades or captures contaminants.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The case study was conducted using publicly available design documents for two remediation strategies designed by Battelle for Dover Air Force Base (AFB) in Dover, DE
该案例研究使用了巴特尔为位于美国多佛空军基地

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The funnel was to be constructed from prefabricated steel sheet piling sealed together with cementitious grout.
漏斗由预制钢板桩建造，并用水泥浆密封在一起。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The impermeable funnel construction is intended for use as part of an in-situ groundwater remediation system. Specifically, this process involving a funnel-and-gate style Permeable Reactive Barrier (PRB) is applied to treat contaminated groundwater within Dover Air Force Base. It is used to allow the natural flow of groundwater to pass through a reactive cell that degrades or captures contaminants, which makes it a targeted solution for environmental restoration efforts and pollution control at contaminated sites.
隔水漏斗结构旨在用作原位地下水修复系统的一部分。具体来说，包含漏斗-导水门式渗透性反应屏障（PRB）的这个过程应用于多佛空军基地内受污染地下水的处理。它允许地下水自然流经反应池，以降解或捕获污染物，使其成为环境修复努力和污染控制的针对性解决方案。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Life-Cycle Case Study Comparison of Permeable Reactive Barrier versus Pump-and-Treat Remediation
Life-Cycle Case Study Comparison of Permeable Reactive Barrier versus Pump-and-Treat Remediation

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should note that the parameters of the impermeable funnel and PRB are designed specifically for the case study at Dover Air Force Base. Adaptation to other sites requires careful consideration of the local hydrogeological conditions, contaminant types, and concentration levels. It is recommended to verify the suitability of the PRB design for other locations, and necessary adjustments may need to be estimated using modeling. Inputs or emissions that were not included in the databases need to be calculated based on site-specific data when adapting this process. Any such adjustments should be based upon available literature or fundamental principles.
使用此数据集的用户应注意，隔水漏斗和PRB的参数是专门为多佛空军基地的案例研究设计的。适应其他场所需要仔细考虑当地的水文地质条件、污染物类型和浓度水平。推荐验证PRB设计的适用性以及是否需要对其它地点进行调整，必要的调整可能需要使用模型来估算。在适应该过程时，未包括在数据库中的输入或排放需要基于特定场地的数据进行计算。任何此类调整都应依据现有文献或基本原理。

completeness.common:other: Unit processes with inputs or emissions that were not included in the databases were estimated from available literature, calculated using fundamental principles, or omitted.
具有未包含在数据库中的输入或排放的单元过程是根据现有文献估计的，使用基本原理计算的，或省略的。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
